items.content_html: 👋 轻量级 ChatGPT 聊天平台, 实现 ChatGPT 联网功能，多账户均衡负载，缓存，鉴权系统，支持 Stream 实时响应，图像生成，对话记忆功能 👋 Lightweight ChatGPT chat platform, implement ChatGPT online searching service, multi-account load balancing, cache, authentication system, supports stream real-time response, image generation and memory function

items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

items.content_html: A small lightweight HTTP server that converts photos, images and scanned documents to text using optical character recognition by utilizing the power of Google Tesseract.

items.content_html: observerly's lightweight, zero-dependency, type safe astrometry library written in TypeScript. This library can be used to ascertain to positions of the Sun, Moon and the planets, as well as ascertain transit times for any astronomical object.
items.title: observerly/astrometry: observerly's lightweight, zero-dependency, type safe astrometry library written in TypeScript. This library can be used to ascertain to positions of the Sun, Moon and the planets, as well as ascertain transit times for any astronomical object.

items.title: keplersj/create-lite-jest-runner: A lightweight Jest runner creator

items.content_html: This is a lightweight rich text editor that allows the user to make a high degree of customization of the editor's behavior.

items.content_html: A fast, lightweight, runtime agnostic and asynchronous routing framework.

items.content_html: Testcontainers is a NodeJS library that supports tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.
